bio: Chilhuahua has weathered the cold of the freezing mountains, and grown in power for it. Despite his frostbite, his heart is warm.

soultimate.name: Subzero
soultimate.description: A pillar of ice appears to hit foes for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Increases damage of Ice Element attacks by 25%.
skill.name: Fangsicles

name: Freezing Chilhuahua
